verses.plain: Come, and let us return unto the LORD: for he hath torn, and he will heal us; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up.

tokens.t: Come, and let us return unto the
: for he hath torn, and he will heal us; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up.

verses.plain: After two days will he revive us: in the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight.

tokens.t: After two days will he revive us: in the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight.

verses.plain: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.

verses.plain: ¶ O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee? O Judah, what shall I do unto thee? for your goodness is as a morning cloud, and as the early dew it goeth away.

tokens.t: ¶ O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee? O Judah, what shall I do unto thee? for your goodness
as a morning cloud, and as the early dew it goeth away.

verses.plain: Therefore have I hewed them by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments are as the light that goeth forth.

tokens.t: Therefore have I hewed
by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments
the light

verses.plain: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice; and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.

tokens.t: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice; and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.

verses.plain: But they like men have transgressed the covenant: there have they dealt treacherously against me.

tokens.t: But they like men have transgressed the covenant: there have they dealt treacherously against me.

verses.plain: Gilead is a city of them that work iniquity, and is polluted with blood.

tokens.t: Gilead
a city of them that work iniquity,
polluted with blood.

verses.plain: And as troops of robbers wait for a man, so the company of priests murder in the way by consent: for they commit lewdness.

tokens.t: And as troops of robbers wait for a man,
the company of priests murder in the way by consent: for they commit lewdness.

verses.plain: I have seen an horrible thing in the house of Israel: there is the whoredom of Ephraim, Israel is defiled.

tokens.t: I have seen an horrible thing in the house of Israel: there
the whoredom of Ephraim, Israel is defiled.

verses.plain: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.

tokens.t: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.
